short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SoundCloud Dark Theme, with a Pink twist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a theme that uses Diogo Silva's 'DarkCloud' extension, and gives the accents a nice pink colour (#f68cf6). The extensions exclusively works on https://soundcloud.com and nothing else.
